# Milliseconds in a Day

> Number of milliseconds in a day.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var MILLISECONDS_IN_DAY = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/milliseconds-in-day' );
```

#### MILLISECONDS_IN_DAY

Number of milliseconds in a day.

``` javascript
MILLISECONDS_IN_DAY === 86400000;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var MILLISECONDS_IN_DAY = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/milliseconds-in-day' );

console.log( MILLISECONDS_IN_DAY );
// => 86400000
```
